Test Name: Medium-Chain Acyl-CoA Dehydrogenase (MCAD) Deficiency Full Gene Analysis
Purpose: To analyze the ACADM gene for mutations in order to diagnose and guide management of MCAD deficiency.
Container: EDTA tube (for blood) or buccal swab collection kit
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, agarose electrophoresis system, Next-Generation Sequencing platform or capillary sequencer
